ProcessSpecification.name: PIP5D7NotifyOfShipFromStockAndDebitAuthorizationRequest
ProcessSpecification.Documentation: This PIP enables (1) a distributor to request authorization to sell stock at a new buy price and claim reimbursement for the difference between the original price and the new price.

BusinessDocument.name: Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request Notification Notification
BusinessDocument.Documentation: References an existing quote and specific line items. This is the only information needed to make the authorization request, as customer or project details are expected to be documented in the actual quote.

Package.name: Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request

BusinessTransaction.name: Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request

RequestingBusinessActivity.name: Initiate Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request Notification

DocumentEnvelope.name: Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request Notification
DocumentEnvelope.businessDocument: //BusinessDocument[@name="Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request Notification"]

RespondingBusinessActivity.name: Process Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request Notification

BinaryCollaboration.name: Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request
BinaryCollaboration.Documentation: The PIP Start State is comprised of the following conditions: a. TPA Approved and Exist In Backend System b. Sending Partner Exist as Party and Valid c. Receiving Partner Exist as Party d. Business Document Exist In Backend System, Valid, Non-Repudiated and Authorized

The PIP End States are comprised of the following conditions: a. Acknowledgment of Receipt Exist In Backend System, Valid and Non-Repudiated b. Receiving Partner Authorized ; PIP Failure State: a. NOT Successful b. Retry Count Exceeded

Start.toBusinessState: ../BusinessTransactionActivity[@name="Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request"]

BusinessTransactionActivity.name: Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request
BusinessTransactionActivity.businessTransaction: //BusinessTransaction[@name="Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request"]

Failure.fromBusinessState: ../BusinessTransactionActivity[@name="Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request"]
